extracted_playbook.condition: Is the device running a vulnerable version?

extracted_playbook.title: Scan Device with Latest Malware Remover
extracted_playbook.description: Use the latest version of Malware Remover from QNAP App Center to detect and remove QSnatch or other malware.

extracted_playbook.condition: Did the installation via App Center fail?

extracted_playbook.title: Manually Install Malware Remover
extracted_playbook.description: Follow the QNAP tutorial to manually install Malware Remover or contact QNAP Technical Support for assistance.

extracted_playbook.title: Run a Full Factory Reset
extracted_playbook.description: Perform a full factory reset on the device to ensure it is not compromised.

extracted_playbook.title: Update Firmware to Latest Version
extracted_playbook.description: Update the device firmware to the latest version to patch vulnerabilities.

extracted_playbook.condition: Is the device intended for internal storage only?

extracted_playbook.title: Block External Connections
extracted_playbook.description: Block external connections to the device if it is intended to be used strictly for internal storage.
